none:
Originally ripped by Terminal Escape, posted on December 18, 2024 Description from Terminal Escape:
 Just under the wire, CRIME 84 may have just delivered the toughest punk tape I've heard all damn year. Straight up. UK82 all amped up real fukkn high with a sinister snarl and a swarm of guitars. Maximum energy hardcore street stomps - crank "Louder Than Bomb" up to the appropriate volume and you'll never be the same. Now...I need to cop that 12" they did last year, and fast. Because I'm about to wear this tape the fuck out. STOLEN

seo.title: Crime 84 - Stolen - Terminal Escape
